attributes.action: free inocent people from the big brother Dna Data base
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: calls on the goverment to delete Dna samples ,photos and finger print from the data base a soon as possible were a person as had a malisious alligation made towards them were no evidence what so every has been found by the police and where there has beeen no previous contact with the law.
